Data: Agar to Taylor, no run tossed up outside off, Taylor scuttles forward but can't get it past cover
Agar to Taylor, 1 run flighted, Taylor waits and opens the face a little more, pushed in front of square
Agar to Roy, no run tries to uses the feet, darted in on off and Roy squeezes the bat down on it
Agar to Roy, no run well bowled, gives this some air and it drifts in before spinning away past the bat, Wade then takes off the bails for good measure but Roy hadn't moved out of his ground
Agar to Roy, 2 runs length, flatter trajectory, worked away through square off the back foot
Agar to Roy, 1 run tossed up and Roy again closes the face, nudges through midwicket for one
Cummins to Roy, no run back of a length outside off, 88mph, Roy gets over it in defence
Cummins to Roy, FOUR runs edged for four! Did Roy open the face at the last moment? Possibly, and with no slip in it flew away, wide of the diving Wade
Cummins to Roy, 2 runs goes back and across and this time steers the ball deliberately wide of third man, comes racing back for two - wave of the bat for an attractive fifty from just 34 balls
Cummins to Roy, 1 run length outside off, Roy runs another one down to third man
Cummins to Taylor, no run short outside off, drops back and defends square
Cummins to Taylor, 1 run banged in short again, 88mph and Taylor jumps back, fends it away through backward square
Agar to Taylor, 1 run tossed up, Taylor skips out and punches down the ground to long-off
Agar to Roy, 1 run flighted, around off stump, pushed back past the bowler
Agar to Taylor, 1 run length ball, slightly flat and worked away through square leg off the back foot
Agar to Roy, 1 run looped up, Roy comes forward and punches to the bowler's left, Agar gets a hand on it but can only take the pace off, mid-off cleans up but they get through for a single
Agar to Taylor, 1 run angled in with the arm, pushed down the ground coming forwards
Agar to Roy, 1 run pushed through a bit quicker outside off, Roy steers it away through cover point
Cummins to Roy, 2 runs pitched up on the stumps, Roy sashays forward and whips through mid-on, looks like another boundary but for an excellent bit of fielding, still they get back for two
Cummins to Roy, no run full, 92mph outside off, pushed watchfully into the covers
Cummins to Roy, FOUR runs phwoar, that's four! Short outside off, Roy rocks back and uses the pace, swats it aerially over backward point and away to the fence
Cummins to Roy, 1 run on the stumps, worked into the leg side
Cummins to Taylor, no run good pace from Cummins, bringing the heat, Taylor meets it with an icy defence
Cummins to Taylor, no run pitched up around the line of off, shows it a straight bat coming forwards
Agar to Roy, 1 run tossed up, there's some grip and the ball clips the outside edge as Roy pushes forwards, falls safely into the off side and bounces away into a gap
Agar to Taylor, no run angled in, again the ball straightens, gets a leading edge into the covers
Agar to Taylor, 2 runs full length, Taylor dances out and whips the ball away through midwicket, gets a couple into the deep
Agar to Taylor, 1 run Agar has a graze on his elbow already but he throws himself after another punch down the ground, can't quite get there
Agar to Roy, no run pushed down the leg side, Roy is hit on the pad play across the line

Agar to Roy, OUT comes forward, chipped into the off side without conviction - and Roy is gone! This is a waste, he was looking so good and he has donated Agar his maiden ODI wicket, popping the ball straight to short extra cover. Maxwell initially palmed it up into the air and then grabbed it at the second attempt
Cummins to Taylor, 1 wide slightly back of a length and veering down the leg side
Cummins to Taylor, no run over the top of off, 91mph and jabbed back into the covers as Taylor skitters across his stumps
Cummins to Taylor, 1 run even quicker from Cummins, 92mph on off stump, Taylor shows a slightly wonky bat and gets a thick inside edge through backward square leg
Cummins to Morgan, no run pushed across the lefty from over the wicket, flying through off a length and left alone - that's left a smoke trail at 96mph!
Cummins to Morgan, FOUR runs touch full and wide and stroked through the covers, that's a nice way to get going, leaning out and punching a half-volley to the boundary boards
Cummins to Morgan, no run there's the throat ball in response, nasty from Cummins, the batsman just manages to jerk out of the way

Cummins to Morgan, no run searing pace and a horrible length, rising past the outside edge as Morgan stays back and fends at it... There's a somewhat belated appeal but don't think any bat was involved
Agar to Taylor, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, worked away into a gap at midwicket
Agar to Morgan, no run stays round the wicket, tossed up on leg stump, defended
Agar to Morgan, no run gives it some air, leg-stump line, Morgan leans out and taps back to the bowler
Agar to Morgan, no run slightly short from Agar, the batsman drops back and flicks the ball, momentarily in the air but short of midwicket
Agar to Morgan, no run full and flighted outside off, reaches for the drive but picks out cover
Agar to Morgan, 1 run very full on the stumps, moves to the off side and dabs one through backward square leg
Cummins to Morgan, 2 runs short of a length at off stump, 92mph, Morgan just puts bat to ball with an open face and guides through point
Cummins to Morgan, no run that's quick again, 92mph, and it's a bouncer angled across which Morgan attempts to hook but is beaten for pace over the top edge
Cummins to Morgan, 1 run this time it's shorter but wider outside off, Morgan isn't entirely in control but manages to deflect it towards third man
Cummins to Taylor, no run short of a length at off stump, 93mph, Taylor hops across the crease and defends
Cummins to Taylor, 1 run pulled through midwicket from outside off, Taylor got over the top of the ball

Cummins to Morgan, no run he's not comfortable against this one, 91mph, short, but not overly short, and at the body...Morgan thrusts his gloves in front of his face and turns his head, taking the ball straight on the hands
Agar to Taylor, 3 runs uses his feet then clips a low full toss through midwicket...takings England a hundred
Agar to Morgan, 1 run round the wicket, flicked from full outside off down the ground
Agar to Taylor, no run nicely bowled, flighted on middle and off, gripped and took a thick outside edge as Taylor played forward
Agar to Taylor, no run defended from middle and leg
Agar to Taylor, no run more turn, a fraction shorter, Taylor works it behind square on the leg side
Agar to Taylor, 1 run full at the stumps, driven through the covers to the sweeper
Maxwell to Taylor, 3 runs nearly does him first ball, Taylor using feet and almost yorks himself as the ball is fired full outside off but manages to get a toe end to third man
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run round the wicket, tucked wide of mid-on
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run driven towards mid-off who is inside the circle...sharp run, but both batsmen scamper well

Maxwell to Morgan, FOUR runs just wide of mid-on! Morgan lofting the drive this time, connected reasonably cleanly but didn't get the elevation he needed but it's just straight of mid-on as he pulls out a dive
Maxwell to Morgan, no run defended to the leg side
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run pushed square into the off side
Agar to Morgan, 1 bye missed stumping, nice piece of bowling, beats Morgan on the inside edge as aims to the leg side and Wade can't glove the ball at all. Morgan defeated by length as much as spin
Agar to Taylor, 1 run driven down to long-off
Agar to Morgan, 1 run gently worked from outside off down the ground
Agar to Taylor, 1 run worked off the stumps square into the leg side
Agar to Morgan, 1 run just a hint of width outside off, cut into the point region
Agar to Taylor, 1 run clipped towards mid-on and more scurrying from Taylor
Maxwell to Taylor, no run stays round the wicket, flicked to square leg
Maxwell to Taylor, 2 runs neat footwork, gets to the pitch then clips it through midwicket
Maxwell to Taylor, no run taken from off stump to the leg side
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run down the pitch again and whipped through the leg side
Maxwell to Morgan, FOUR runs brings out the reverse sweep, makes good connection, the ball goes in the air but away from short third man and races to deep point
Maxwell to Morgan, no run full outside off, driven to cover
Agar to Taylor, no run grips and turns, squares up Taylor as it beats the outside edge and takes him high on pad. Lovely bowling
Agar to Taylor, 1 run fraction shorter outside off, driven from the back foot to deep cover
Agar to Morgan, 1 run backs away to leg, exposes his stumps, Agar drags the length back but Morgan is able to cut to deep cover...nice contest
Agar to Taylor, 1 run pulled down a little short and swung to deep square
Agar to Morgan, no run bunted back down the pitch

Agar to Morgan, no run defeats him again, this time with a full ball outside with Morgan aims a booming drive at...the ball grips and turns enough to beat the inside edge. Wade doesn't take it. Not a chance this time
Maxwell to Taylor, 2 runs pitches outside leg, flicked in the air in front of square and Taylor is rapid between the wickets
Maxwell to Taylor, no run goes back and defends to the on side
Maxwell to Taylor, no run pushed across outside off and played to the covers
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run closes the face to work into the leg side
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run pushed down the ground
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run goes for a lap-sweep, loops off a top edge over Wade's head into space
Agar to Taylor, 1 run floated up at the stumps, tapped into the on side and mid-on can't get in quickly enough
Agar to Morgan, no run appeal for lbw! Morgan back in his crease, but Rob Bailey says not out. Turned too much, perhaps. And the bounce
Agar to Morgan, 1 wide slips this one down the leg side
Agar to Morgan, FOUR runs lovely timing and placement by Morgan, strong wrists as he lofts his over extra cover and between the deep fielders on the off side
Agar to Morgan, no run touch shorter, pushed back to the bowler
Agar to Morgan, 1 run worked from outside off down to long-on
Agar to Taylor, 1 run pushed square into the off side
Maxwell to Taylor, no run flicked to square leg
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run a little shorter, on the pads, tucked in front of square
Maxwell to Morgan, no run nudged to the leg side
Maxwell to Morgan, no run cut from outside off to cover
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run played out to deep cover
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run gets a loopy leading edge into the leg side but it plops into space towards long-on
Pattinson to Taylor, 3 runs full outside off, and that's a strong cover drive by Taylor as he moves forward nicely into the ball...deep cover is just able to get around
Pattinson to Morgan, 1 run chopped down to third man from outside off
Pattinson to Taylor, 1 run short of a length outside off, dropped into the backward point area. Maxwell's throw hits Morgan. The crowd boos. Maxwell smiles and apologises
Pattinson to Morgan, 2 runs tucked through the leg side
Pattinson to Morgan, FOUR runs wrong line, too much on leg stump, Morgan flicks his wrists and sends it very fine
Pattinson to Morgan, 1 run adjust the line, back outside off, Morgan angles it down to third man
Maxwell to Morgan, FOUR runs more top-class placement from Morgan, it's a full delivery, he just opens his stance a fraction then drives sweetly through extra cover and places it wide of the sweeper
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 wide speared down the leg side, Morgan misses his sweep
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run a little shorter and slower, Morgan onto the back foot and it slides off the face to backward point
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run flicked down the ground to long-on
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run lofts straight down the ground, bisects long-off and long-on
Maxwell to Taylor, no run flicked to midwicket
Maxwell to Taylor, no run appeal for lbw as Taylor comes down the pitch, takes him on the front pad with significant turn...long way down the pitch
Pattinson to Morgan, no run back of a length, straight, pushed to mid-on
Pattinson to Morgan, 1 run uses his feet then drives crisply straight at mid-off, still able to steal the single
Pattinson to Taylor, 1 run full outside off, Taylor throws his hands through a drive which skews down to third man
Pattinson to Morgan, 1 run short, angled across the left hander, pulled in the air just in front of square
Pattinson to Taylor, FOUR runs that's his first boundary...drives another full delivery and gets it square through point this time, has the timing and placement to beat the cover sweeper
Pattinson to Taylor, no run tighter to off stump, back of a length, defended
Starc to Morgan, FOUR runs just wide of Wade! Morgan edges a powerful drive, and the nick evades the out-stretched left glove of the keeper as he flung himself in the air
Starc to Morgan, 1 run another edge down to third man, this one off the bottom of the bat against a low full toss...takes him to his fifty off 46 balls
Starc to Taylor, 1 wide short and down the leg side
Starc to Taylor, no run back full outside off, punched to cover
Starc to Taylor, no run his bottom hand comes off the bat as he walks forward into this drive...not quite to the pitch
Starc to Taylor, 2 runs outside leg stump, neatly flicked away fine but deep square is able to get around the boundary
Starc to Taylor, 1 run full outside off, 79mph, driven wide of cover
Marsh to Taylor, 1 run guided down to third man and now it's Taylor to fifty, a controlled innings off 59 balls
Marsh to Morgan, SIX runs fantastic strike by Morgan, picks up a full delivery, a slower ball, and dispatches it perfect straight down the ground. The best of Morgan
Marsh to Morgan, 1 run another one with pace off, outside off this time and cut down to third man
Marsh to Taylor, no run full outside off, 71mph, driven to cover
Marsh to Taylor, FOUR runs a mighty powerful pull from Taylor, fetches a short(ish) delivery from outside off and hammers it through midwicket
Marsh to Taylor, no run fuller and straight, defended
Starc to Morgan, 2 runs full and wide, Morgan drives square through point
Starc to Morgan, no run driven powerfully to mid-off
Starc to Morgan, 1 run low full toss outside off, driven to deep cover
Starc to Taylor, 1 run full outside off, again driven to deep cover
Starc to Morgan, 1 leg bye full and angled into the pads, deflects towards fine leg and Wade does the chasing
Starc to Taylor, 2 runs quickly onto another short ball, gets over the top of it - perhaps not the hardest thing for Taylor - and pulls through square to take England to 200
Marsh to Morgan, no run width outside off, cut firmly but straight to Maxwell at point
Marsh to Morgan, 1 run cuts again, takes more of a bottom edge this time and bobbles to Maxwell's right this time
Marsh to Taylor, no run pushes a length ball with an open face...Maxwell the man again
Marsh to Taylor, 2 runs short, pulled backward of square
Marsh to Taylor, 1 leg bye full at leg stump, takes the pad to the leg side
Marsh to Morgan, 1 run full outside off, driven down the ground

Maxwell to Morgan, OUT picks out long-off...Maxwell strikes first ball back! Aims to clear the boundary again, but it comes off the bottom of the bat and lands comfortably in the lap of Starc as he takes a couple of paces in
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run on the stumps, comes forward and clips one down the ground

Maxwell to Stokes, no run round the wicket, tossed up and Stokes attempts to reverse sweep his first ball, hit on the pad and Maxwell appeals... After some thought, Joel Wilson shakes his head. Actually, replays show the ball struck him on the gloves
Maxwell to Stokes, 1 run worked back past the bowler this time
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run angled in on the stumps and Taylor nudges one more away through midwicket
Maxwell to Stokes, 1 run tossed up outside off, Stokes comes forward and opens the face to punch through point
Marsh to Stokes, no run length ball on the stumps, defended
Marsh to Stokes, no run slightly short, over the stumps and Stokes again blocks on the back foot
Marsh to Stokes, no run beaten outside off, teasing him with a tight line and length, Stokes drawn into pushing at it
Marsh to Stokes, no run this drifts down the leg side, flick and a miss, must have kissed the padding as not called wide
Marsh to Stokes, 1 run presses forward to a length ball, drops it into the covers to the right of the fielder and calls through Taylor, who makes his ground as the throw comes in
Marsh to Taylor, 1 run good length outside off, Taylor drops back and runs it down to third man
Maxwell to Taylor, no run round the wicket, tossed up on the stumps, clipped to backward square leg
Maxwell to Taylor, 2 runs gives this a bit more air, Taylor is down on one knee to sweep, picks a gap for a couple
Maxwell to Taylor, no run on the stumps, worked to short midwicket
Maxwell to Taylor, no run angled in again, Taylor closes the face and picks out the same fielder
Maxwell to Taylor, no run pushed through on middle and leg, Taylor gets a leading edge short on the off side trying to work across the line
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run tossed up, comes forward and punches one down the ground
Marsh to Taylor, no run pitched up on middle stump, dug out towards mid-on
Marsh to Taylor, no run takes the pace off, Taylor defends it back towards the bowler
Marsh to Taylor, no run another slower ball, wide of the stumps and Taylor throws his hands at a cut and misses
Marsh to Taylor, no run tighter to the off stump, pushed back to the bowler coming forwards
Marsh to Taylor, 1 run length outside off, cutter from Marsh, opens the face and runs the ball down to third man
Marsh to Stokes, 1 run length delivery on the pads, Stokes glances through midwicket for one
Maxwell to Stokes, no run darted in on the pads, Stokes aims an agricultural slog to leg and is struck on the pads
Maxwell to Stokes, no run presses forward and defends into the off side
Maxwell to Stokes, no run gives this some air, Stokes comes out but doesn't quite get to the pitch and elects to defend
Maxwell to Stokes, 1 run steps out and crunches hard into the ground, gets one through the covers
Maxwell to Taylor, no run tossed up on middle stump, drilled back along the ground but straight to the bowler
Maxwell to Taylor, FOUR runs gets forward and this time manages to lift the ball over mid-off, nicely struck from inside to out, clears the fielder and that's a welcome boundary
Marsh to Stokes, no run another slower delivery from Marsh, outside the line of off, play and a miss from Stokes
Marsh to Stokes, no run gets across and bunts a length ball into the covers
Marsh to Stokes, 1 wide sprays it wide as Stokes jumps out... Too wide
Marsh to Stokes, 2 runs full and wide and this time Stokes chases it, slicing over backward point, third man has to get round to cut it off
Marsh to Stokes, FOUR runs short ball and BLAP! that will be four... Stokes hits his mark at last, his feet in the air as he swings the ball meatily away through midwicket
Marsh to Stokes, 1 run gets forward and pushes one into a gap in the covers
Marsh to Taylor, no run full and speared on leg stump, hits the pad and Taylor is sent back after advancing a few steps down the pitch
Maxwell to Stokes, 2 runs tossed up and Stokes swipes a couple in front of deep extra cover

Maxwell to Stokes, OUT slogged high into the leg side and Finch positions himself safely under it at mid-on! Stokes will obstruct the England innings no longer, he was trying to put Maxwell into the confectionary stall but only succeeded in sending a top edge billowing straight up into sky
Maxwell to Taylor, no run angled in and straightening a touch as Taylor plays it from the crease
Maxwell to Taylor, 2 runs goes down early on to one knee and paddles the ball away over short fine leg for a couple
Maxwell to Taylor, 3 runs flighted outside leg stump, again Taylor is waiting for it, crouched low and flicking the ball very fine, Bairstow runs hard for a third
Maxwell to Bairstow, no run length ball, nice and slow on leg stump, Bairstow prods at it and misses
Cummins to Ali, OUT Moeen goes big... and goes home! Tries to pull a length ball from outside off stump and sends a top edge steepling to midwicket. England are trying to tap out, here
Cummins to Taylor, FOUR runs slides on to the pads, Taylor glances fine and it runs away, using Cummins' pace and that boundary takes him to within a well-timed blow of a hundred
Cummins to Taylor, 1 run full and wide, Taylor squeezes a drive towards backward point, they take on Maxwell and Plunkett gets home
Cummins to Plunkett, 1 run back of a length outside off, Plunkett plays a back-foot drive into the covers for one

Cummins to Taylor, OUT short and pulled to midwicket, Plunkett had come charging down... and he's run out by a mile as Taylor sends him back! Another flaccid dismissal, although to be fair to Taylor there was no run there
Cummins to Taylor, 1 run short delivery on off stump, 90mph from Cummins, waits and pulls through backward square to go to 98 and keep the strike
Starc to Taylor, 1 wide slides this down the leg side
Starc to Taylor, 1 run pushed across the right-hander from over the wicket, steered through gully, Taylor on to 99 now and past the 98 not out he made against Australia at the World Cup
Starc to Woakes, 2 runs back of a length, worked off the hips through backward point for a couple
Starc to Woakes, no run goes round the wicket, pitched up outside off, Woakes can't get a drive through the infield
Starc to Woakes, 1 run low full toss from Starc, 89mph and bunted through cover point for a single
Starc to Taylor, no run back over the wicket to Taylor, he comes forward and punches a half-volley to extra cover... Still he waits
Starc to Taylor, no run full length, wide of the stumps and Taylor thrashes a single through the covers to reach his century is kept on 99 by a brilliant diving stop from Smith
Cummins to Taylor, 2 runs short of a length, Taylor shuffles across and nudges a single through backward square
Cummins to Taylor, 1 run good length outside off stump, Taylor drops back, angles the bat and runs one to third man
Cummins to Bairstow, no run pitched up and driven into the covers, there's a direct hit at the non-striker's end but Taylor hadn't gone anywhere
Cummins to Bairstow, 1 run short and sitting up over middle and leg, YJB swats a pull through square leg to get off the mark
Cummins to Taylor, no run Taylor chides himself for swishing at a wide one and missing, might have been a slower ball
Cummins to Taylor, no run length, 91mph outside off, dabbed towards Maxwell at point, who is quickly into position to throw, should they want to take him on. They don't
Maxwell to Bairstow, no run length on the stumps, YJB advances and gets a leading edge into the covers
Maxwell to Bairstow, no run darted on the stumps, turned to midwicket
Maxwell to Bairstow, 1 run tossed up, reverses the hands and swats one through backward point
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run floated up on the stumps, Taylor wheedles down the pitch and pushes one to long-on
Maxwell to Bairstow, 1 run full length, Bairstow drives powerfully but sends it straight and quickly to long-off
Maxwell to Taylor, 1 run pushed across outside off, steered through point into the deep
Cummins to Woakes, 1 run Woakes slogs into the air, out towards long-on... but it falls short of the man running in

Cummins to Taylor, 1 run full and driven back down the track it hits Woakes' bat and rebounds into the stumps... Taylor is racing down the pitch regardless and he dives for his ground as Cumming tries to take a stump out of the ground! The umpires decide not to send it upstairs so that's it - a maiden ODI hundred for James Taylor. Well played, though England's total
Cummins to Woakes, no run back of a length outside off, Woakes swings at it and misses
Cummins to Woakes, 1 leg bye appeal for lbw from Cummins, hit over the knee roll playing back in front of the stumps
Cummins to Taylor, 1 run comes forward and steers this through the covers
Cummins to Woakes, 1 run full outside off, Woakes drives powerfully but Cummins gets some boot in the way and deflects it to mid-off - just a single to end a very good spell at the death
Starc to Woakes, 1 run full outside off, steered through backward point by Woakes
Starc to Taylor, OUT short of a length, tries to club down the ground... but can't clear mid-off! Taylor falls for 101, top-edging tamely to the edge of the ring to leave England eight down
Starc to Woakes, SIX runs clears the front leg and deposits the ball into the stands at deep midwicket! Woakes gives it some last desperate humpty and puts England on the brink of 300
Starc to Woakes, 1 run round the wicket, fried in full and dug out down the ground for one
Starc to Rashid, 1 run short, outside off, Rashid pulls in the air but just short of mid-on, they run regardless
Starc to Woakes, 1 run pitched up, Woakes backs away and drills the ball back along the ground, Starc gets a hand on it but can't prevent the single that sees England finish on a round 300

5.30pm: England have posted 300 but it was with something of a whimper, after they were 205 for 2 with 17 overs to go. We'll have to wait a couple of hours before we can properly evaluate James Taylor's hundred, I think - he certainly held England together, as wickets fell in the latter overs, but there will be plenty who think this is a below-par score. What is certain is

Welcome back, folks. Gnasher with you for the start of the chase. Should be an interesting one. Australia one good innings away from wrapping up the series, but England have a decent total to bowl at. Steven Finn will open the bowling...

Finn to Burns, 1 run short of a length outside off, defended square of the wicket towards point where Stokes lets it through his hands then leaves it for someone else to collect by which time Burns is off the mark
Finn to Finch, 1 run and he's away first ball, pushes a fuller delivery into the off side
Finn to Burns, no run short of a length, angled into Burns, worked towards mid-on
Finn to Burns, no run fuller this time, Burns pushes back towards Finn who sticks out his right hand
Finn to Burns, no run angled into the pads, clipped sweetly to mid-on
Finn to Burns, no run tight line around off stump, 88mph, defended off the back foot to the covers
Woakes to Finch, no run short of a length outside off, Finch tries to force it off the back foot but doesn't get any timing
Woakes to Finch, no run keeps it on the shorter side, angling into Finch who tries to pull it off his hip but doesn't make contact
Woakes to Finch, 1 leg bye gets inside the line of this delivery and flicks it backward of square...ah, there's no bat. Just off the thigh pad
Woakes to Burns, no run punched sweetly from off stump towards mid-on
Woakes to Burns, 1 run a little fuller this time, Burns onto the front foot and just blocks...the ball beats Woakes and neither mid-on or mid-off can stop it. Single given away
Woakes to Finch, no run aims to pull this but the ball takes his the top of his front leg and bobbles towards slip
Finn to Burns, 2 runs full, angled into the pads, flicked wide of mid-on
Finn to Burns, 1 run short of a length, worked into midwicket

Finn to Finch, 5 runs buzzers! On a length outside off, pushed into the off side and more free runs handed to Australia as Taylor's throw from cover is fairly wide of the stumps and poorly backed up by Moeen
Finn to Burns, no run gets on top of the bounce outside off, plays it square towards point where a ball goes cleanly to hand
Finn to Burns, no run full and straight, 88mph, driven to cover
Finn to Burns, no run nearly dragged on! Aiming to force a ball outside off into the covers, takes a bottom edge and just bounces over the stumps
Woakes to Finch, no run back of a length at middle and off, 86mph, defended towards mid-on
Woakes to Finch, 1 wide a short ball outside off, Finch bails out of his pull and it's called wide on height
Woakes to Finch, FOUR runs that's a clean strike, Finch drives on the up through a full delivery and lofts it over mid-on
Woakes to Finch, no run touch wider outside off, drags the length back, played to the covers
Woakes to Finch, no run on off stump, short of a length at 86mph, defended to midwicket
Woakes to Finch, no run a touch fuller this time, defended
Woakes to Finch, no run gets onto off stump and punches a short-of-a-length delivery to mid-on
Finn to Burns, no run opens the face to a length delivery on off stump and finds Stokes at point
Finn to Burns, no run straighter this time, 87mph, defended firmly back to the bowler
Finn to Burns, no run gets beaten over the top edge as he tries to cut a shorter delivery...half-hearted shot
Finn to Burns, 1 run pushes it fuller again, at off stump, forced through the off side to deep square
Finn to Finch, FOUR runs clears mid-on again, holds his shape superbly as he punches through the line of a delivery which wasn't that full...had no intention of keeping it down
Finn to Finch, no run full at middle and off, 88mph, defended this time to mid-on
Woakes to Burns, 3 runs that's a club over the leg side, the bat face closed as he drove but he comfortably cleared the in-field
Woakes to Finch, FOUR runs terrific stroke, fetches a short delivery from outside off and pulls it through square leg...had a lot of time to play that stroke
Woakes to Finch, no run a little fuller, but Finch is still playing off the back foot as he punches back to Woakes
Woakes to Finch, FOUR runs now he goes over mid-off, not quite out of the middle this time but plenty of weight behind the shot as he crunches it down the ground
Woakes to Finch, no run on the back foot, defended to the bowler
Woakes to Finch, no run touch of fortune this time as he forces off the back foot and gets an inside edge into his pads
Finn to Smith, no run defended to the off side
Finn to Smith, FOUR runs a sweet way to get off the mark, drills a full ball through the off side...zinged off the bat
Finn to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, 88mph, defended to the covers
Finn to Smith, no run a shorter delivery, Smith is across his stumps and defends on the back foot
Finn to Smith, no run low full toss but it doesn't prove costly as Smith picks out mid-on
Woakes to Finch, no run short of a length, angled into Finch, takes his thigh guard
Woakes to Finch, no run fuller at off stump, 86mph, Finch staying back as he defends to cover
Woakes to Finch, 1 run pushed straight down the pitch and mid-on can't get around in time
Woakes to Smith, no run punched square to point
Woakes to Smith, FOUR runs top shot, comes forward and pierces the gap through the off side with a compact cover drive
Woakes to Smith, no run drags the length back and Smith defends to the covers
Finn to Finch, no run touch of extra bounce from a good length, or perhaps Finch was playing a little low...either way he pulled the bottom hand off the bat
Finn to Finch, no run short of a length at off stump, defended to the on side
Finn to Finch, no run punched into the off side
Finn to Finch, no run goes fuller, driven firmly towards mid-on
Finn to Finch, no run short and angled down the leg side...looked a sure wide, but Joel Wilson doesn't call it. Finch bemused
Finn to Finch, no run fuller, angled into the pads, flicked to midwicket
Plunkett to Smith, no run full outside off, 85mph, onto the front foot and defends
Plunkett to Smith, 1 run wristy from Smith was he flicks this from outside off through the leg side

Plunkett to Finch, FOUR runs a lovely piece of timing, blimey that was sweet, just punches a back-of-a-length delivery straight down the pitch. Splits mid-on and mid-off and just keeps on running away
Plunkett to Finch, 2 runs flicked off the hip behind square
Plunkett to Finch, 1 run driven towards mid-on who is on the circle so it's an easy single
Plunkett to Smith, 1 run tight run! Back of a length, driven just to the left of Taylor at cover. Finch a little slow, but Taylor doesn't hit. Was probably safe.
Finn to Smith, no run shuffles across the crease, works towards the on side
Finn to Smith, 2 runs flashed away behind point, width from Finn, but third man is able to get around
Finn to Smith, no run full outside off, 86mph, slotted straight to cover
Finn to Smith, no run defended from outside off to midwicket...as so often, you can see all three stumps behind him as Smith plays that
Finn to Smith, 2 runs right across the crease again, clips a full ball which is probably around off stump down to long leg
Finn to Smith, 1 run cracks a pull a shot from well outside off, but Taylor flings himself to his left at midwicket and takes most of the pace off the shot
Plunkett to Smith, 1 run driven out to deep cover
Plunkett to Finch, 1 wide full and very wide outside off, Finch chases it but doesn't connect...this time the wide is call
Plunkett to Finch, 1 run punched straight down the ground but mid-on gets around
Plunkett to Smith, no run full at off stump, 87mph, defended firmly back to the bowler
Plunkett to Smith, 1 run feeds off a straight delivery again, taken from around middle and off through the leg side
Plunkett to Finch, FOUR runs pings another straight drive with supreme timing, drilled in the air over Plunkett...one of the best places to hit a cricket ball
Plunkett to Finch, no run opens the face a touch this time as he drives and finds cover
Finn to Smith, no run drives a full ball from outside off and midwicket runs across to cut it off
Finn to Smith, FOUR runs gets away with this one, forcing off the back foot, his bat slices across the ball, gets an inside edge that scoots to the right of Bairstow
Finn to Smith, 1 run tucked off the pads to deep square leg
Finn to Finch, no run gets away with a ball on the pads, Finch picks out short fine leg
Finn to Finch, no run back on off stump, defended to the bowler in his follow through
Finn to Finch, no run on off stump, defended
Rashid to Smith, 1 run full outside off, driven to deep cover
Rashid to Finch, no run dragged down short outside off, but Finch can only find Rashid
Rashid to Finch, no run works a straight delivery to the leg side
Rashid to Finch, 1 run short again, this time it's driven off the back foot down the ground
Rashid to Smith, no run not quite coming off the surface, which means Smith doesn't beat cover with his back-foot drive
Rashid to Smith, 1 run fuller to end the over, flicked down to long-on
Plunkett to Smith, no run full outside off, Smith drives comes right out of the middle but straight to Morgan at cover
Plunkett to Smith, 1 run note the same power this time, places it wide of Morgan to the sweeper
Plunkett to Finch, 1 run full and straight, another piece of lovely timing down the ground but long-on is now in place
Plunkett to Smith, no run short or dropped? Taylor at midwicket. Flicked from Finch, bat face closed a touch, and it landed inches in front of Taylor as he dived forward
Plunkett to Smith, no run a cutter, 81mph, grips a touch and played into the leg side
Plunkett to Smith, no run well bowled, beats him outside off with a full delivery...not trying for top pace, the ball holds its line
Rashid to Finch, no run beaten as he tries to cut a wide delivery
Rashid to Finch, no run on leg stump, swept but picks out short fine leg
Rashid to Finch, 1 run tossed up very full, clubbed down the ground
Rashid to Smith, no run goes back and drives into the covers

Rashid to Smith, OUT what a catch! Finn at short midwicket. Unusual position for him, but he's used his reach to great effect. Smith down the pitch, aimed a flick through the leg side, Finn flings himself to his right - almost horizontal - sticks out his right hand and holds a blinder. Jonty Rhodes and Ben Stokes would have been proud.
Rashid to Bailey, 1 run uses his feet straightaway and drives down to long-off
Plunkett to Bailey, 2 runs full and wide, driven in the air over backward point, into big open space
Plunkett to Bailey, no run full at off stump, defended to cover
Plunkett to Bailey, no run past the edge, full outside off, just nips off the seam to beat Bailey's defensive shot
Plunkett to Bailey, no run full and straight, driven back to the bowler
Plunkett to Bailey, 1 run full outside leg stump, clipped to deep square
Plunkett to Finch, FOUR runs fantastic stroke, Finch moves on his merry way with a delightful drive wide of mid-off...onto the front foot
Rashid to Bailey, no run tossed up on leg stump, Bailey turns to leg but can't get it by midwicket
Rashid to Bailey, 1 run flighted, on the stumps, jams down on it and picks up one back past the bowler
Rashid to Finch, no run this is a bit quicker, around off stump, pushed into the covers
Rashid to Finch, 1 run gives this some air outside off, Finch presses forward and drives down the ground to long-off
Rashid to Bailey, 1 run punched slightly uppishly back past the bowler, another run to long-off
Rashid to Finch, no run tossed up around off stump, Finch leans into a forward defensive

Plunkett to Bailey, 2 runs back of a length and turned through backward square... they come racing back for a second and the throw hits Finch as he runs his bat in. An English wag appeals for obstructing the field and there are grins all round
Plunkett to Bailey, 1 run pitched up and pushed through the covers coming forwards
Plunkett to Finch, 1 run off-stump line, just a push down the ground from the ogre-strong Finch, long-on comes across to cut it off
Plunkett to Bailey, 1 run outside off, drops back and runs one to third man
Plunkett to Finch, FOUR runs lovely stroke, power and placement from Finch, gets on to the front foot and bullets the ball wide of mid-off for four
Plunkett to Finch, no run pitched up on off stump, defended watchfully
Rashid to Bailey, no run flighted on the stumps, tries to reverse sweep but can't get it away
Rashid to Bailey, 2 runs flighted on the stumps, skips down and drills a drive back past the stumps at the other end, Woakes saves it on the boundary
Rashid to Bailey, 1 run taps one more down the ground
Rashid to Finch, no run tossed up and prodded defensively into the off side

Rashid to Finch, 2 runs googly from Rashid and Finch gets a bit lucky, looking to launch down the ground, a thick inside edge bounces out towards wide mid-on, between two men... Just a couple and that takes him to a solid fifty on his return
Rashid to Finch, no run slow and loopy on the stumps, Finch plays it into the leg side
Ali to Bailey, 1 run over the wicket, tossed up and Bailey uses the feet, whips a single down to long-on
Ali to Finch, 1 run flighted, Finch plants the foot and pushes another single to long-on
Ali to Bailey, 1 run angled in with the arm and Bailey again leaves the crease to on drive down the ground

Ali to Finch, no run some turn for Moeen, past the inside edge and it loops up off the pad... Bairstow does brilliantly to chase and catch with one hand but Joel Wilson correctly adjudges that there was no glove involved
Ali to Finch, 1 run length ball, spinning in and deflected down the leg side
Ali to Bailey, no run flighted, outside off, blocked coming forwards
Rashid to Finch, 1 run on the stumps, worked across the line and they pick up one via a misfield at midwicket
Rashid to Bailey, 1 run tossed up, comes forward and pushes down the ground, maybe a leading edge
Rashid to Finch, no run floated up on leg stump, turned to midwicket

Rashid to Finch, OUT Finch tries to tee off... and hits it straight up and down into the safe hands of Woakes running in from long-on! Rashid has a second, he's been a struggle to score off and Finch was trying to break the shackles, a moment of Hulk-like violence but he is soon slinking off looking more like Bruce Banner
Rashid to Bailey, no run tossed up, leaves the crease and squirts a leading edge to short straight mid0off
Rashid to Bailey, 1 run even slower, there's some turn again and an outside edge runs into a gap at cover to keep Bailey on strike
Ali to Bailey, no run tossed up outside off and spinning in as Bailey advances and is hit on the pad
Ali to Bailey, no run Bailey leaves his crease early again, Moeen drags it down and the ball loops off the pads again as Bailey pulls out of the shot
Ali to Bailey, no run skips down once more, again it's too short for him to get to
Ali to Bailey, no run flighted, reverses the hands this time, hit on the wrists
Ali to Bailey, no run flighted around off stump and spinning in, can't get this one away to the leg side
Ali to Bailey, no run tossed up, spinning from off outside leg stump, Buttler collects and it's not called wide - maiden for Moeen
Rashid to Maxwell, 1 leg bye floated up, slightly leg side, Maxwell pushes at it and the ball runs fine off the pad
Rashid to Bailey, no run a beauty, tossed up legbreak and spinning past the outside edge as Bailey presses forwards
Rashid to Bailey, no run tossed up outside off, pushed back down the track
Rashid to Bailey, no run comes forward and pushes into the covers
Rashid to Bailey, 1 run driven, in the air but just past the dive of short mid-off! Wasn't quite to the pitch but got away with the stroke
Rashid to Maxwell, no run tossed up outside off, Maxwell has a big yahoo across the line and misses completely
Ali to Bailey, no run slightly short and Bailey swats it forcefully around the corner... straight to square leg, however
Ali to Bailey, no run comes forward and works the ball to midwicket
Ali to Bailey, 1 run tossed up, drifting in, Bailey whips the ball with the spin through mid-on
Ali to Maxwell, no run floated up outside off, Maxwell turns the ball softly into the leg side
Ali to Maxwell, no run full, flighted outside off, Maxwell reverses the bat and sweeps, briefly in the air but short of the man on the edge of the ring
Ali to Maxwell, no run slow, on the stumps, Maxwell can only dink it into the leg side
Rashid to Bailey, no run ugly long hop down the leg side from Rashid... but Bailey can only swipe it straight to short fine leg! Missed out there, even England's bad balls are becoming dots
Rashid to Bailey, 1 run tossed up, comes forward and drives wide of the catcher, Stokes diving after it, and down to long-off
Rashid to Maxwell, 2 runs Maxwell leans back and lashes a couple over the covers, it's reeled in out towards the boundary
Rashid to Maxwell, FOUR runs flighted, on the stumps, Maxwell hits against the spin and gets it into a gap wide of long-on, who slides but can't prevent four - welcome boundary for Australia
Rashid to Maxwell, 2 runs chipped over the infield this time, a flamingo flick from Maxwell, wide of long-on again for a couple
Rashid to Maxwell, 1 run on the stumps and whipped through midwicket for a single to keep the strike
Ali to Maxwell, FOUR runs superbly done by Maxwell, reverse-sweeping against the spin and it's in the air but in front of point and bounces away to the unprotected boundary
Ali to Maxwell, FOUR runs tossed up and Maxwell plays that vengeful reverse-slap over cover again! This was struck even more firmly, high and into the gap for four more

Ali to Maxwell, OUT tries a reverse dab this time, a top edge loops up and Bairstow takes a simple catch! Umpire Wilson slowly raises his finger and although Maxwell looks disgusted it is probably with the shot rather than the decision. It was more of a poke where the previous two attempts went fully through with the shot and the ball spooned off the toe, hit the ar
Ali to Marsh, 1 run comes forward and is off the mark first ball with a clip down the ground
Ali to Bailey, 1 run on the stumps and flicked through the leg side, slightly aerial but lands safely
Ali to Marsh, no run goes back and defends to the leg side
Rashid to Marsh, no run spinning in, the wrong 'un, worked to midwicket
Rashid to Marsh, 2 runs leans out to drive and gets a thick edge through cover point for four
Rashid to Marsh, FOUR runs drops a little short and Marsh stays back, clips the ball firmly through backward square, no one out there and it's four
Rashid to Marsh, no run flighted, punched down the ground and mid-off cuts it off, scrambling after it to prevent a run

Rashid to Marsh, no run pushed through quicker and he's trapped on the crease, up goes the finger! Marsh has a chat with George Bailey and asks for a review and, although he seemed to be pretty adjacent, Hawk-Eye shows that is was juuuuuuuuuuusssst missing off stump, straightening slightly too much - so Rob Bailey's decision is overturned and Marsh continues
Ali to Bailey, 2 runs floated up on the stumps, goes down on one knee and paddles a couple through fine leg
Ali to Bailey, 1 run turned through the leg side, they think about two but settle for a single
Ali to Marsh, 1 run flat on the stumps, Marsh stands up and punches one to long-on
Ali to Bailey, no run pushed through a bit quicker outside off, Bailey jumps out and defends
Ali to Wade, no run round the wicket, angled in and defended pressing forwards
Rashid to Marsh, no run floated up on the stumps, Marsh shuffles across and blocks
Rashid to Marsh, no run lovely delivery, flighted outside off and spinning away as Marsh feels for it
Rashid to Marsh, no run struck on the pads playing back this time, possibly outside the line again
Rashid to Marsh, no run on the stumps, worked into the leg side
Rashid to Marsh, no run tossed up outside off, Marsh drives a little uppishly but the ball bounces short of cover
Rashid to Marsh, no run gives it some air, outside off, Marsh watchfully blocks coming forwards - another maiden for England
Ali to Wade, no run tossed up and defended pressing forwards on off stump
Ali to Wade, no run on the stumps and blocked
Ali to Wade, no run tight stuff from Moeen, lines it up in defence
Ali to Wade, no run flat offbreak, comes across and pushes back down the ground
Ali to Wade, 1 run angled in, Wade makes a bit of room for himself and drives back past the bowler to long-off
Ali to Marsh, 1 run flighted, outside off, Marsh prods at it and edges wide of the keeper, no slip and he'll get one
Rashid to Marsh, 1 run floated up outside off, steps forward and punches through the covers
Rashid to Wade, 3 wide tossed up, slightly leg side and the ball spins past the bat, runs away for a couple
Rashid to Wade, 1 run floated up across the left-hander from over the wicket, Wade goes down on one knee and ramps one fine
Rashid to Marsh, 1 run flighted on the stumps, pushed back past the bowler to long-on
Rashid to Wade, 1 run touch short, Wade drops back and stabs one more through the covers
Rashid to Marsh, no run another pearler from Rashid, gives it a rip, pitches on leg and breaks past Marsh's outside edge, into the keeper's gloves
Rashid to Marsh, no run tossed up on middle and leg, Marsh covers the line this time and blocks - that's the end of an excellent spell from Rashid
Ali to Wade, no run flat on off, tapped into the covers defensively
Ali to Wade, 1 run touch short, Wade goes back on off stump, back-foot punch through cover point
Ali to Marsh, no run on the stumps, flicked to leg slightly aerially, falls short of midwicket
Ali to Marsh, no run on the stumps, dabbed into the covers
Ali to Marsh, 1 run goes back in the crease and flicks the ball with the turn through backward square for one
Ali to Wade, no run goes back, play-and-a-miss and Wade nearly perishes, the ball blowing a kiss at the off bail as it straightens
Plunkett to Marsh, no run good length on off stump, squared up slightly and steered towards point
Plunkett to Marsh, no run shuffles back and across and again blocks a length ball into the off side
Plunkett to Marsh, 1 run fullish, Marsh gets forward and punches a drive through the covers
Plunkett to Wade, no run length outside off stump, Wade runs the ball towards backward point
Plunkett to Wade, 1 run fuller, gets forward, driven crisply through the covers to the fielder in the deep
Ali to Wade, 1 run driven off the back foot to deep cover
Ali to Agar, no run digs out his first ball in ODI cricket back to the bowler
Ali to Agar, no run gets forward, bat and pad together, defends
Ali to Agar, no run drives into the covers
Ali to Agar, no run can't find a gap
Ali to Agar, 1 run very full, drilled down to long-off
Plunkett to Agar, no run flashes and misses outside off, perhaps didn't quite get up as Agar thought
Plunkett to Agar, no run comes round the wicket, jabs out a yorker to the off side
Plunkett to Agar, no run into the off side
Plunkett to Agar, 1 wide angled down the leg side, shapes to flick it away, he misses but gets the wide
Plunkett to Agar, 1 run works a straight delivery through midwicket
Plunkett to Wade, 1 run comes forward and gets this one past the cover ring
Plunkett to Agar, no run low full toss, played from outside leg stump into the covers
Ali to Wade, 1 run driven down to long off
Ali to Agar, 1 run dabbed into the covers
Ali to Wade, 1 run dug out down the ground
Ali to Agar, 1 run down to long off
Ali to Wade, no run driven back to the bowler
Ali to Wade, no run drops this shorter outside off but Wade can only find cover
Plunkett to Agar, no run back of a length at off stump, pushed towards mid-off
Plunkett to Agar, 1 run tight with a direct hit, turned into midwicket where Morgan was quickly onto it but the throw is wide...Wade was gone
Plunkett to Wade, no run defended to the covers
Plunkett to Wade, no run back of a length, cramps him for room, pushed to the off side
Plunkett to Wade, 1 run fuller and wider outside off, driven to deep cover

Plunkett to Agar, OUT amazing! Roy holds what turns into a screamer. Agar launched this miles into the night sky and into the lights. Roy steadies himself at long on, but slightly misjudges it and the ball spills out as he falls backwards but, astonishingly, he is able to hold the rebound before the ball falls to the ground. A touch of fortune, yes, but some mind-bo
Ali to Starc, 1 run in the air again! Driven just wide of cover, Morgan can't get across
Ali to Wade, 1 run swept to deep square leg
Ali to Starc, no run a heave and a miss to the leg side...nearly bowled
Ali to Starc, no run and again, more fresh air as Moeen tosses it up
Ali to Cummins, 1 run pushed down the ground from outside off
Plunkett to Cummins, 2 runs works a length delivery into the leg side, they come back for a second and Hales throws to the wrong end...Cummins was struggling
Plunkett to Cummins, no run swing and a miss to the leg side
Plunkett to Cummins, 2 runs sweet connection on this one as he clubs over the leg side to deep midwicket
Plunkett to Wade, FOUR runs he's clobbered that, a back-of-a-length ball, through the covers
Plunkett to Wade, 1 run heaved down the ground
Stokes to Wade, no run back of a length outside off, beats him as he tries to go through the off side
Stokes to Wade, 1 wide very wide outside off
Stokes to Wade, no run swung to cover
Stokes to Wade, 2 runs pulled from outside off down to long on
Stokes to Wade, 1 run crunched down the ground, one bounce to long-off
Stokes to Pattinson, no run a slower, short ball outside off, dies under Pattinson's bottom edge
Stokes to Pattinson, no run tries to pull again, comes off the splice of the bat into the off side but short of cover
Plunkett to Wade, no run full outside off, a big swoosh from Wade
Plunkett to Wade, FOUR runs gets too leg side, pulled backward of square
Plunkett to Wade, 2 runs comes down the pitch, it's a big full toss outside off which is sliced down to third man
Plunkett to Wade, 1 run yorker outside off, jabbed to the leg side
Plunkett to Pattinson, 1 run swung down to long-on
Plunkett to Wade, 1 run clubbed from outside off into midwicket
Stokes to Wade, 1 run a length delivery outside off, smacked out to deep cover

Stokes to Pattinson, 1 leg bye an appeal for lbw, pitched outside leg, but there should have been run out. Throw went to the wrong end again. Just a little bit of chaos. And now they review the lbw. And, yes, it pitched miles outside leg.
Stokes to Wade, 1 run full and straight, heaved back over Stokes' head to long-on
Stokes to Pattinson, no run a shorter ball, at the body, takes him in the chest
Stokes to Pattinson, no run slogged into the leg side, Stokes gets across
Stokes to Pattinson, no run yorker at leg stump, Pattinson manages to keep it out
Finn to Wade, FOUR runs that's a good shot, drives a back-of-a-length delivery over extra cover and wide of long-off
Finn to Wade, 1 run down the pitch and then pulls over midwicket
Finn to Pattinson, 1 run gives himself a touch of room and cuts to deep cover
Finn to Wade, FOUR runs that made a terrific noise of the bat, pulled from outside off high over midwicket but drops just short of being six...longest boundary
Finn to Wade, FOUR runs and now he goes wide of long-off, another lovely clean strike
And that wraps it upfor tonight. It's all to play for at Headingley on Friday. We'll see you then. But for now, from Gnasher and Alan, it's goodbye and thanks for joining us,

England win by 93 runs and the series is back to 2-1. A impressive all-round display where England took advantage of winning the toss. James Taylor's maiden hundred anchored the innings, helped by Jason Roy and Eoin Morgan, then the spinners came to the fore. Rashid and Moeen were outstanding, as was England's fielding after a careless start in the first couple of overs. A
England won by 93 runs
Player of the match is James Taylor, ENG
